# Data
```{r}
day <- read_csv("day.csv")
monday <- day %>% filter(weekday == 1)

n <- nrow(monday) * 0.7

set.seed(13)
# The training set should be 70% of the data
n <- nrow(monday) * 0.7
train <- sample_n(monday, n, replace = FALSE)
test <- anti_join(monday, train, by = "dteday")
```
